verses.roman:
jagat bhariyā loka bale--'hari' 'hari'
sei-kṣaṇe gaurakṛṣṇa bhūme avatari

synonyms: jagat—the whole world; bhariyā—fulfilling; loka—people; bale—said; hari hari—the holy name of the Lord; sei-kṣaṇe—at that time; gaurakṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa in the form of Gaurahari; bhūme—on the earth; avatari—advented.
translation: When the whole world was thus chanting the holy name of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa in the form of Gaurahari advented Himself on the earth.
